verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hark the glad sound! The Savior comes, the Savior promised long; let ev'ry heart prepare a throne and ev'ry voice a song.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He comes the pris'ners to release, in Satan’s bondage held; the gates of brass before him burst, the iron fetters yield.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He comes, from darkening scales of vice To clear the inward sight; And on the eye-balls of the blind To pour celestial light.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: the broken heart to bind, the bleeding soul to cure, and with the treasures of his grace, to enrich the humble poor.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Our glad hosannas, Prince of Peace, your welcome shall proclaim, and heav'n’s eternal arches ring, with your beloved name
